column4: can anyone tell me how to get back to my X windows defaults from just after i installed the system?
what do i need to do to get a reply in here?
ok let me put it another way I asked a question to simply restore my old X config I dont know how many times ive asked it seems to have gone ignored every time
did you check in /etc/X11/ for a file like xorg.conf.back or something?
then it seens you dont have a backup
